plurals.name: warning_delete_accounts
plurals.item: You are going to DELETE some accounts PERMANENTLY. Are you sure?

plurals.name: warning_delete_persons
plurals.item: This person and its all transactions will be DELETED PERMANENTLY. Are you sure?
You are going to DELETE some persons PERMANENTLY. Are you sure?

plurals.name: warning_delete_transactions
plurals.item: This transaction will be DELETED PERMANENTLY. Are you sure?
You are going to DELETE some transactions PERMANENTLY. Are you sure?

plurals.name: warning_delete_money_transfer_history
plurals.item: This money transfer history will be DELETED PERMANENTLY. Once deleted the balance of the related accounts will also be rollbacked. Are you sure?
You are going to DELETE some money transfer histories PERMANENTLY. Once deleted the balance of the related accounts will also be rollbacked. Are you sure?
